title: # 330 - Nikki Glaser & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Nikki Glaser to talk about Dancing with the Stars, Last Comic standing, getting fired, anorexia, high school, the exercise challenge, and much more!

Check out her show “You Up?” with Nikki Glazer. “You Up?” is now a podcast! Subscribe now on Apple Podcasts or your favorite podcast app. You can also listen to the show on Sirius XM’s Comedy Central Radio Channel 95 every Monday through Thursday at 10am.

This episode is brought to you by Noom. Start your trial today and start losing weight for good at www.noom.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. Save $20 off of your first month of the anti aging kit by going to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Mercari. Don't let your old stuff go to waste. You can find Mercari on the app stores or at www.mercari.com 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
